description:
As Ains muddles his way through ruling his new kingdom, he continues to ponder over a particularly important question. Everyone in his kingdom and the Tomb of Nazarick is also waiting for his answer. What kind of kingdom does he wish to create?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le royaume sorcier d`Ainz Ooal Gown
Sorcerer Kingdom Ains Ooal Gown: Ains Ooal Gown Nation of Leading Darkness
アインズ・ウール・ゴウン魔導国
